attributes.action: The Queen to take back control of the UK
attributes.additional_details:
As the politicians are hell bent on giving the UK, a Christian country to Islam, the people declare that the political elite are not fit for purpose!
The Royalty (Queen) would do a far better job!

rejection.details:
Please see the petition below:

Petition Title: We the people of the UNITED Kingdom respectfully ask HM The Queen to convene a Constitutional Convention

Created by: James Verduyn

Closing: 30/03/2015
